**Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) - Request for Proposal (RFP)**
=====================================

[Canada Buys Website]{.underline}
[Procurement Number]{.underline}
1000251061

**Summary of Work**
-----------------

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) hereby issues a Request for Proposal (RFP) for professional services to support the delivery of IT/Cyber Security activities for Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) and Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) programs, applications, and systems.

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing expert technical services on an "as and when required" basis through Task Authorizations (TAs) to perform, verify, analyze, design, test, assess, and monitor various aspects of IT/Cyber Security.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* IT/Cyber Security services support for ISC and CIRNAC programs, applications, and systems.
* Tier 1 qualified services provider under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region.
* Service categories include:
	+ Business Analyst (Level 3)
	+ IT Security Methodology, Policy, and Procedures Analyst (Level 3)
	+ IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst (Level 3)
	+ IT Security Design Specialist (Level 3)
	+ IT Security VA Specialist (Level 3)

**Tender Overview**
-----------------

The RFP is open for two years with the option to extend for three one-year periods. This requirement is open only to the qualified providers who have already secured a spot under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region.
